citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
A current Program of Veterinary care was not available for review. The Program of Veterinary Care contained the
information for the previous Attending Veterinarian, who had left the facility in December 2022. A written Program Of
Veterinary Care must be updated with the information for the current Attending Veterinarian and be available for review
during APHIS inspections. The facility must correct this issue.
*********Correct by May 15, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.33(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
A current Program of Veterinary care was not available for review. The Program of Veterinary Care contained the 
information for the previous Attending Veterinarian, who had left the facility in December 2022.  A written Program Of 
Veterinary Care must be updated with the information for the current Attending Veterinarian and be available for review 
during APHIS inspections. The facility must correct this issue.  
*********Correct by May 15, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
